scripts..env:
cross-var node -e "const referenceDirectoryPath = path.resolve(process.cwd(), ...('$npm_package_config_referenceRelativePath'.split('/'))); const workDirectoryPath = path.resolve(process.cwd()); const temporaryDirectoryPath = path.resolve(referenceDirectoryPath, '..', 'tmp'); const generatedDirectoryPath = path.resolve(referenceDirectoryPath, '..', 'generated'); const buildDirectoryPath = path.join(workDirectoryPath, ...('$npm_package_config_buildRelativePath'.split('/'))); const sdkDirectoryPath = path.join(workDirectoryPath, ...('$npm_package_config_sdkRelativePath'.split('/'))); fs.writeFileSync('.env', 'OPENAPI_DIRECTORY_PATH=' + path.resolve(generatedDirectoryPath, 'openapi') + '
' + 'SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH=' + sdkDirectoryPath + '
' + 'TYPESCRIPT_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH=' + path.join(sdkDirectoryPath, 'typescript') + '
' + 'PYTHON_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH=' + path.join(sdkDirectoryPath, 'python') + '
' + 'BUILD_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH=' + path.resolve(buildDirectoryPath, 'sdk') +'
' + 'BUILD_EXTENSIONS_DIRECTORY_PATH=' + path.resolve(buildDirectoryPath, 'extensions') +'
' + 'PYTHON_EXECUTABLE=' + (process.platform === 'win32' ? 'python' : 'python3') + '
' + 'PYTHON_VENV_PIP_FILE_PATH=' + '.venv' + path.sep + (process.platform === 'win32' ? 'Scripts' : 'bin') + path.sep + 'pip' + '
' + 'PYTHON_VENV_PYTHON_FILE_PATH=' + '.venv' + path.sep + (process.platform === 'win32' ? 'Scripts' : 'bin') + path.sep + 'python' + '
PYTHON_VENV_NAME=.venv' + '
'+ 'TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH=' + temporaryDirectoryPath + '
', { encoding: 'utf8'});"
scripts.reset:dotenv: cross-var "npm run clean && npm run reset:typescript:dotenv && npm run reset:python:dotenv && shx rm -rf ./node_modules $BUILD_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH $BUILD_EXTENSIONS_DIRECTORY_PATH"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:this && npm run clean:typescript && npm run clean:python && npm run clean:instances
scripts.updateVersion: npm run sdk:updateVersion && npm run instances:updateVersion
scripts.sdk:typescript:prepare:dotenv: cross-var "shx rm -rf $TYPESCRIPT_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/src/picteus-ws-client && symlink-dir $OPENAPI_DIRECTORY_PATH/typescript-fetch/src $TYPESCRIPT_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/src/picteus-ws-client && cd $TYPESCRIPT_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH && npm install"
scripts.sdk:typescript:build:dotenv: cross-var "npm run sdk:typescript:prepare && mkdirp $BUILD_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/typescript && cd $TYPESCRIPT_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH && npm run compile && npm pack --pack-destination=$BUILD_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/typescript"
scripts.sdk:python:prepare:dotenv: cross-var "shx rm -rf $PYTHON_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/picteus_ws_client $PYTHON_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/dist && symlink-dir $OPENAPI_DIRECTORY_PATH/python/picteus_ws_client $PYTHON_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/picteus_ws_client && cd $PYTHON_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH && $PYTHON_EXECUTABLE -m venv $PYTHON_VENV_NAME && $PYTHON_VENV_PIP_FILE_PATH install -r requirements.txt"
scripts.sdk:python:build:dotenv: cross-var "npm run sdk:python:prepare && mkdirp $BUILD_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/python && cd $PYTHON_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH && $PYTHON_VENV_PYTHON_FILE_PATH -m build --sdist --outdir $BUILD_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/python"
scripts.sdk:build: npm run sdk:typescript:build && npm run sdk:python:build
scripts.sdk:public:build:dotenv: cross-var "shx rm -rf $TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH/publicsdk && mkdirp $TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH/publicsdk && shx cp -r $SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH $TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH/publicsdk/sdk && shx cp -r package.json node_modules $TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH/publicsdk && cd $TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH/publicsdk && npm run .env && gulp -f sdk/gulpfile.mjs tweakForPublicSdk --environmentFileName .env --npmScript sdk:build"
scripts.sdk:python:publish:dotenv: cross-var "cd $BUILD_SDK_DIRECTORY_PATH/python && pip install twine && twine upload -r pypi './*'"
scripts.sdk:publish: npm run sdk:typescript:publish && npm run sdk:python:publish
scripts.build: npm run sdk:build && npm run instances:build
